Exports correlation matrix or tables to csv or clipboard

Opens a dialog to select a project file to open.

reverse_edge(parent: str, child: str) → None[source]

Reverse an existing edge (and recalculate conditional rank correlations)

save() → None[source]

Save current project, checks if the file name is already known. If not, the save as function is called and the user is asked to pick a file.

save_as(fname=None) → None[source]

Asks the user for the file name to save the project to. If the file name is passed, the user is not asked the file and the project is saved directly.

Parameters

fname (str, optional) – File name, by default None

update_bn() → None[source]

Updates the BN model by calculating the correlation matrix, correlation bounds, and edges
